content:
IVbcHostObject4 Interface

In this Article

Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE. In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command-line compilers.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("2AE3233C-8AB3-48A0-9ED9-6E3545B3C566")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IVbcHostObject4 : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost, Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject3

Methods summary

SetVBRuntime(String)

Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE. In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command line compiler.

Methods

  • SetVBRuntime(String)

    Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE. In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command line compiler.

    public bool SetVBRuntime (string VBRuntime);

    Parameters

    • VBRuntime
      String

      The name of the Visual Basic Runtime Library.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      Returns true if the method succeeds; otherwise, returns false.
